医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
父母物质使用障碍与儿童智力障碍的风险增加有关瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员报告说，父母患有酒精或吸毒疾病的孩子出现智力障碍的风险更大，即使问题仅在于父亲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Parental-substance-use-disorder-linked-to-greater-risk-of-intellectual-disability-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Parental-substance-use-disorder-linked-to-greater-risk-of-intellectual-disability-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de2aee0b-a9ea-4635-95cb-9b898fed1dd9 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 10:12:45 -0400 Parental substance use disorder linked to greater risk of intellectual disability in children
使用 DNA 纳米球的新方法可能会彻底改变病原体检测卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员开发了一种利用 DNA 纳米球检测病原体的新方法，旨在简化核酸检测并彻底改变病原体检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Novel-method-using-DNA-nanoballs-could-revolutionize-pathogen-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Novel-method-using-DNA-nanoballs-could-revolutionize-pathogen-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c77184ae-c4ea-4582-8e08-dd84b8b88451 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 10:04:33 -0400 Novel method using DNA nanoballs could revolutionize pathogen detection
大量摄入乳化剂可能增加心血管疾病风险发表的一项研究表明，工业加工食品中广泛使用的多种乳化剂（属于“E 数字”食品添加剂组的一部分）可改善质地并延长保质期，大量摄入这些乳化剂会增加心血管疾病 (CVD) 的风险今天由英国医学杂志报道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/High-intake-of-emulsifiers-may-increase-risk-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/High-intake-of-emulsifiers-may-increase-risk-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e151464e-bbe7-48b6-ac9c-0cb2f2096c44 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 09:18:23 -0400 High intake of emulsifiers may increase risk of cardiovascular disease
新设备可以帮助测试神经胶质瘤患者的治疗方法这种新设备的形状和大小与米粒一样，可以同时进行数十项实验，以研究新疗法对一些最难治疗的脑癌的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/New-device-can-help-test-treatments-in-病人-with-gliomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/New-device-can-help-test-treatments-in-病人-with-gliomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4c43468-d56d-4ff4-8df2-55aab1cc0207 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 09:17:25 -0400 New device can help test treatments in patients with gliomas
健康饮食：饮食干预如何影响糖尿病前期口腔和肠道微生物组、代谢物和细胞因子研究人员评估了两种饮食对 200 名糖尿病前期个体的肠道和口腔微生物群、细胞因子和代谢物的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Eating-for-health-how-dietary-interventions-impact-pre-diabetic-oral-and-gut-microbiome-metabolites-and-cytokines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Eating-for-health-how-dietary-interventions-impact-pre-diabetic-oral-and-gut-microbiome-metabolites-and-cytokines.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c758f64-5094-434f-a3c2-b22877aee117 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 09:03:00 -0400 Eating for health: how dietary interventions impact pre-diabetic oral and gut microbiome, metabolites and cytokines
广谱抗生素与新生儿败血症风险较高有关预印本为新生儿败血症与产前抗生素有关的假设提供了证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Broad-spectrum-antibiotics-linked-to-higher-sepsis-risk-in-neonates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Broad-spectrum-antibiotics-linked-to-higher-sepsis-risk-in-neonates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7901a08-42e2-4504-9c83-3bc55c4ef678 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 08:49:00 -0400 Broad-spectrum antibiotics linked to higher sepsis risk in neonates
欧加农任命两项领导层来增强研发专业知识专注于女性健康的全球医疗保健公司 Organon（纽约证券交易所股票代码：OGN）今天宣布任命医学博士胡安·卡米洛·阿霍纳·费雷拉 (Juan Camilo Arjona Ferreira) 为首席医疗官 (CMO)，任命医学博士夏洛特·欧文斯 (Charlotte Owens) 为医疗事务和结果主管研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Organon-Bolsters-Research-Development-Expertise-with-Two-Leadership-Appointments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Organon-Bolsters-Research-Development-Expertise-with-Two-Leadership-Appointments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1295306-a5c0-4bac-9c1a-4fe47ff3942e Thu, 07 Sep 2023 08:49:00 -0400 Organon Bolsters Research & Development Expertise with Two Leadership Appointments
探索核桃粉在无麸质面包中的好处研究人员评估了核桃粉（WF）作为生产低碳水化合物面包的成分的理化、感官和光谱特性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Exploring-the-benefits-of-walnut-flour-in-gluten-free-bread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Exploring-the-benefits-of-walnut-flour-in-gluten-free-bread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55d80314-ca9d-4d49-b1af-0a41f3959e2b Thu, 07 Sep 2023 08:27:00 -0400 Exploring the benefits of walnut flour in gluten-free bread
BA.2.86 Omicron 变体：我们的免疫力是否受到围攻？发布到 bioRxiv 服务器的新预印本讨论了该变体是否表现出中和逃逸。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/BA286-Omicron-variant-Is-our-immunity-under-siege.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/BA286-Omicron-variant-Is-our-immunity-under-siege.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2604c22-5f65-48d5-a026-374626be0814 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 08:22:00 -0400 BA.2.86 Omicron variant: Is our immunity under siege?
长时间使用电脑对动眼功能的影响研究人员使用眼动仪收集不同屏幕时间间隔的眼球运动数据，对长时间使用电脑期间动眼功能的变化进行了评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/The-impact-of-prolonged-computer-use-on-oculomotor-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/The-impact-of-prolonged-computer-use-on-oculomotor-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fea97d6-e5db-42e4-b69b-57fc00453100 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 08:18:00 -0400 The impact of prolonged computer use on oculomotor function
